00023 @import "CPFlashMovie.j"
00024 @import "CPView.j"
00025 
00026 
00027 var IEFlashCLSID = "clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000";
00028 
00032 @implementation CPFlashView : CPView
00033 {
00034     CPFlashMovie    _flashMovie;
00035     
00036     CPDictionary    _params;
00037     CPDictionary    _paramElements;
00038     
00039     DOMElement      _DOMParamElement;
00040     DOMElement      _DOMObjectElement;
00041     DOMElement      _DOMInnerObjectElement;
00042 }
00043 
00044 - (id)initWithFrame:(CGRect)aFrame
00045 {
00046     self = [super initWithFrame:aFrame];
00047     
00048     if (self)
00049     {
00050         if (!CPBrowserIsEngine(CPInternetExplorerBrowserEngine))
00051         {
00052             _DOMObjectElement = document.createElement(@"object");
00053             _DOMObjectElement.width = @"100%";
00054             _DOMObjectElement.height = @"100%";
00055             _DOMObjectElement.style.top = @"0px";
00056             _DOMObjectElement.style.left = @"0px";
00057             _DOMObjectElement.type = @"application/x-shockwave-flash";
00058             _DOMObjectElement.setAttribute(@"classid", IEFlashCLSID);
00059             
00060             _DOMParamElement = document.createElement(@"param");
00061             _DOMParamElement.name = @"movie";
00062             
00063             _DOMInnerObjectElement = document.createElement(@"object");
00064             _DOMInnerObjectElement.width = @"100%";
00065             _DOMInnerObjectElement.height = @"100%";
00066             
00067             _DOMObjectElement.appendChild(_DOMParamElement);
00068             _DOMObjectElement.appendChild(_DOMInnerObjectElement);
00069             
00070             _DOMElement.appendChild(_DOMObjectElement);
00071         }
00072         else
00073             [self _rebuildIEObjects];
00074     }
00075     
00076     return self;
00077 }
00078 
00079 - (void)setFlashMovie:(CPFlashMovie)aFlashMovie
00080 {
00081     if (_flashMovie == aFlashMovie)
00082         return;
00083         
00084     _flashMovie = aFlashMovie;
00085     
00086     if (!CPBrowserIsEngine(CPInternetExplorerBrowserEngine))
00087     {
00088         _DOMParamElement.value = [aFlashMovie filename];
00089         _DOMInnerObjectElement.data = [aFlashMovie filename];
00090     }
00091     else
00092         [self _rebuildIEObjects];
00093 }
00094 
00095 - (CPFlashMovie)flashMovie
00096 {
00097     return _flashMovie;
00098 }
00099 
00100 - (void)setFlashVars:(CPDictionary)aDictionary
00101 {
00102     var varString = @"",
00103         enumerator = [aDictionary keyEnumerator];
00104     
00105     var key;
00106     while (key = [enumerator nextObject])
00107         varString = [varString stringByAppendingFormat:@"&%@=%@", key, [aDictionary objectForKey:key]];
00108     
00109     if (!_params)
00110         _params = [CPDictionary dictionary];
00111     
00112     [_params setObject:varString forKey:@"flashvars"];
00113     [self setParameters:_params];
00114 }
00115 
00116 - (CPDictionary)flashVars
00117 {
00118     return [_params objectForKey:@"flashvars"];
00119 }
00120 
00121 - (void)setParameters:(CPDictionary)aDictionary
00122 {
00123     if (_paramElements && !CPBrowserIsEngine(CPInternetExplorerBrowserEngine))
00124     {
00125         var elements = [_paramElements allValues],
00126             count = [elements count];
00127         
00128         for (var i = 0; i < count; i++)
00129             _DOMObjectElement.removeChild([elements objectAtIndex:i]);
00130     }
00131     
00132     _params = aDictionary;
00133     
00134     if (!CPBrowserIsEngine(CPInternetExplorerBrowserEngine))
00135     {
00136         _paramElements = [CPDictionary dictionary];
00137         
00138         var enumerator = [_params keyEnumerator],
00139             key;
00140         
00141         while (key = [enumerator nextObject] && _DOMObjectElement)
00142         {
00143             var param = document.createElement(@"param");
00144             param.name = key;
00145             param.value = [_params objectForKey:key];
00146             
00147             _DOMObjectElement.appendChild(param);
00148             
00149             [_paramElements setObject:param forKey:key];
00150         }
00151     }
00152     else
00153         [self _rebuildIEObjects];
00154 }
00155 
00156 - (CPDictionary)parameters
00157 {
00158     return _params;
00159 }
00160 
00161 - (void)_rebuildIEObjects
00162 {
00163     _DOMElement.innerHTML = @"";
00164     if (![_flashMovie filename])
00165         return;
00166     
00167     var paramString = [CPString stringWithFormat:@"<param name='movie' value='%@' />", [_flashMovie filename]],
00168         paramEnumerator = [_params keyEnumerator],
00169         key;
00170     
00171     while (key = [paramEnumerator nextObject])
00172         paramString = [paramString stringByAppendingFormat:@"<param name='%@' value='%@' />", key, [_params objectForKey:key]];
00173     
00174     _DOMObjectElement = document.createElement(@"object");
00175     _DOMElement.appendChild(_DOMObjectElement);
00176     
00177     _DOMObjectElement.outerHTML = [CPString stringWithFormat:@"<object classid=%@ width=%@ height=%@>%@</object>", IEFlashCLSID, CGRectGetWidth([self bounds]), CGRectGetHeight([self bounds]), paramString];
00178 }
00179 
00180 - (void)mouseDragged:(CPEvent)anEvent
00181 {
00182     [[[self window] platformWindow] _propagateCurrentDOMEvent:YES];
00183 }
00184 
00185 - (void)mouseDown:(CPEvent)anEvent
00186 {
00187     [[[self window] platformWindow] _propagateCurrentDOMEvent:YES];
00188 }
00189 
00190 - (void)mouseUp:(CPEvent)anEvent
00191 {
00192     [[[self window] platformWindow] _propagateCurrentDOMEvent:YES];
00193 }
